reviewText: Little Foot and the gang is great.  These movies are great social & moral stories set in carton fun. My son & I love them.

I bought a lot of these for my children. They love the Land Before time dvds. I would recommend them for anyone whose little ones love dinosaurs. It is a very good dinosaur show for children to watch.
My 3 yr old LOVES this and all of The land before time movies. Great buy and fun for various ages

I really love The Land Before Time: Adventuring in the Mysterious Beyond. Kids will enjoy it and this is really great cartoon.

The dvd is really good. I really loved the show while it was on the air. Dvd plays really perfect.
We had the VHS  for Land before time and it finally broke..my grandchildren love all the Little Foot series.. so happy that I found it again..
Was a little supprised when the product came, as the description did not state it was part of the TV series.  Still it came in good order and timely.
Some of the LBT DVDs fall flat with my kids but this is one they request over and over.
MY 4-YEAR OLD SON LOVES THE LAND BEFORE TIME SERIES.  THIS IS ANOTHER EXAMPLE OF ENJOYABLE, WHOLESOME FUN WITH LOVABLE CHARACTERS.  THE QUALITY OF THE PRODUCTION IS ALSO FIRST-RATE.
This is a great movie for young kids, not only does it hold their attention but it also teaches them great life lessons. I would recommend this for the young or young at heart.
The movies r great n my kids loves them
My kids love these movies!
i loved land before time as a kid and now i get to watch it all over again.
great
Love these series....my kids watch them all the time.

My older handicapped daughter with a very young way of thinking loves itwatches over and over.  Only negative is a need for parents to limit reruns over strong objections.  I have watched some and find the movies engaging.  We think we have all the episodes and movies made of Land Before Time, so the repeats aren't too memorizable.
I enjoyed watching these movies with my daughter we also enjoyed the series of other.  Little foot is such an adorable character
There are four great stories about Little Foot and his adventures with his friends. Good lessons are emphasized in each one.
The DVD land before time(the wisdom of friends) has no sound played one time ,the next time no sound -if there was sound little bosco would prob .rate it 5 stars
This was a gift for my god son He is a BIG Land Before Time fan. He loves dinosaur's. Soon I will be looking for more. Thanks

Love the series.  My grandson and I are fans of these movies.
BEST SERIE EVER! for kids !!!

I own all of "The Land Before Time" movies and the cartoon episodes. I bought them 10 years ago for my oldest son and daughter who loves all of them. This DVD was the only one that I hadn't bought and now, my youngest son loves these movies. The cartoon episodes are not available in my local stores, so I was very happy that I searched for it on Amazon. The price was really great and I received free 2 day shipping because I am an Amazon Prime member. I am very happy with this purchase!!!
best
My kids loved this DVD!
